medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The abdominal pain started after the patient was working out and grew in intensity in the right lower quadrant (RLQ). The patient also reports subjective fevers, nausea, and malaise, but denies chills, emesis, chest pain, shortness of breath, difficulty voiding, or changes in bowel movements. This is the first time he has experienced such pain.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Eczema, Attention Deficit Disorder (ADD); Past surgical history is not specified.
